abstract: Brazil’s state-run Petroleo Brasileiro, or Petrobras, will acquire Exxon Mobil‘s majority stake in a Japan-based refinery, Nansei Sekiyu, MarketWatch reported, citing a story in Nikkei News.
lead_paragraph: Brazil’s state-run Petroleo Brasileiro, or Petrobras, will acquire Exxon Mobil‘s majority stake in a Japan-based refinery, Nansei Sekiyu, MarketWatch reported, citing a story in Nikkei News.

headline.main: Petrobas to Take Exxon’s Stake in Japanese Refinery
